Package databasehandling

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDb
    An abstract class that is used by the DbHandler instance when a new contact shall be added to the database.
    DbHandler
    Singleton class to handle access classes to the Database
    DBValidator
    Class that loads the driver class and handles the connection to the database.
    DeleteDb  
    KeyGenerator
    create an integer to be used as an Id based on the contact table's largest Id found in table using an SQL query.
    KeyGeneratorTest
    Test of the class KeyGenerator.
    SearchPageDb
    Singleton class to search database.
    UpdateDb
    Given the database connection and a given contact detail object, update the contact with new contact detail information.
